alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:41PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Ravalli County through 715 PM MDT... At 641 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodside, or 7 miles northeast of Hamilton, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and pea sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Woodside, Victor, Pinesdale and Corvallis. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 44 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys
